Early Access Review
								I don't know if they are still working on this game but I would not recommend this game in Early Access.The idea is nice but at the moment the game is nearly unplayable and you should better wait for more updates on this game.Could be a nice Arcadesoccergame but I think there is still a very long way to go.

content:
Posted: July 18, 2015
Early Access Review
								I played a round and thought this game had very interesting concepts and design. Two teams of players wearing futuristic suits face off in a soccer match with no rules, where fighting and fouls are allowed. I would strongly recommend a controller to play this game, and I feel this game has amazing potential and hope to see how it develops and grows.

Early Access Review
								Graphics are ok, and I know this is early access, but currently it's just unplayable.Often the auto player switch would DESELECT the player I needed, and yet sometimes when I pressed switch player it wouldnt do anything until after it was way too late.

content:
Posted: May 30, 2016
Early Access Review
								I really enjoyed my time playing soccer rage, is a sort of hybrid soccer game with combat system, in which you can play soccer as you know or simply kick your rival *****. The game is still on early access, so it has limited content, I hope the developer will continue working on this.Pros:- Is really funny, most if you play with friends.- Graphics and music are ok, animations are neat and effect display correctly with low end cards- Has potential.- Very kind developer.Cons:- There is still a very long way to go, the game needs more content.- The ai need improve.- Awkward controls.
